Bd. otf Directors
-5-
NAEB has prSmary responsibility for entire area of professional
services including:
Placement, In-service training. Internships, Management
training, fellowships, labor management consultation, international
fellowships, liason with teacher training institutions and teachers
of radio-TV, and general development of educational broadcasting
profession.
NETRC will limit workshops to those related to specific
network operations with enrollment only for staff members of
NET stations.
